course_outcomes: Understand differentiation of vector functions and evaluate definite integrals for surface areas and volumes.
Solve differential equations by various methods.
Illustrate limits, continuity and differentiability of complex functions and solve related problems.
Analyze analytic functions and evaluate related problems.
Solve complex integration problems, use Taylor and Laurent series, and understand singularities and residues.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of the fundamentals of computers
course_outcomes: Define and describe fundamentals of Internet of Things (IoT).
Describe and identify IoT reference architecture and design.
Discuss IoT technologies and protocols.
Analyze and evaluate resource management in IoT.
Evaluate IoT applications in different environments and recent trends.
Demonstrate recent IoT application trends.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic Mathematics, Basic knowledge of Problem solving
course_outcomes: Define and analyze time and space complexities of algorithms.
Describe linear data structures (stacks, queues, linked lists) and their applications.
Differentiate and demonstrate searching, sorting and hashing techniques.
State and illustrate non-linear data structures like trees and graphs and write programs using them.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of computer programming language
course_outcomes: Describe Python syntax and semantics and analyze control flow statements.
Demonstrate proficiency in string handling and functions.
Create and manipulate data structures like lists, dictionaries, tuples and sets.
Use file operations, modules and packages effectively.
Apply object-oriented programming concepts in Python to solve problems.
Define and explain functional blocks of a computer, pipeline and memory concepts.
Design data representation in digital computers.
Explain memory systems and pipeline architecture.
Apply data representation and evaluate memory system applications.
Illustrate CPU, ALU and building blocks for various domains.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic concept of Computer Programming Language
course_outcomes: Apply arrays to solve real-life problems.
Implement stacks and queues to solve critical problems.
Develop and test sorting and searching algorithms.
Implement non-linear data structures and graph algorithms.
Apply hashing algorithms to real problems.

subjects.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of computer programming language
course_outcomes: Apply Python syntax and control flow to solve problems.
Use strings and functions in Python programs.
Work with lists, tuples, dictionaries and sets.
Perform file operations, modules and package management.
Implement OOP concepts in Python.
Apply HDL to design combinational and sequential logic.
Implement logic gates and basic arithmetic using HDL.
Design register and memory units and perform memory operations.
Design simple ALU and CPU and interface CPU and memory.

subjects.prerequisites: General understanding of the Indian Constitution, basic rights and duties
course_outcomes: Identify foundational provisions of the Indian Constitution like Preamble, Fundamental Rights and DPSP.
Recognize powers of Legislature, Executive and Judiciary and analyze their distinct roles.
Appraise constitutional provisions, professional ethics and principles of sustainable development.
Analyze interpretation tools and case laws related to the Indian Constitution.
